name: Gem Jump!
description:
Hey Guys! I made another game! I really hope you have fun with it! Please tell me what you think in the comments and leave a review! I really appreciate your support! How high can you get? My personal record is 83!!! 😎 Can you beat it? 🤔😎

Cheers!

ATTENTION!!! Please play in FULLSCREEN mode for correct aspect ratio... thanks! Controls: Use the A and D or the arrow keys to control the player... try not to fall by collecting the "gems" which make you jump higher!

Feel free to check out my other games and assets here: https://astragamesstudios.itch.io/
